大会继续

At the XXV Congress of the CPSU, it was decided to continue funding reformist
Communist parties, so as not to lose their influence in Europe.

New old

New old

In response to the statement by the Secretary General of the ICP Enrico Berlinguer that "in the event of a victory
IСP Italy would remain in NATO", the USSR decides to stop funding reformist
Communist parties of Europe and begin to establish contacts with anti-revisionist movements.

none




Correcting wrong

Correcting wrong

At the XXV Congress of the CPSU, under the influence of Comrade Chernenko, it was decided to
to rehabilitate the anti-party group by restoring their membership in the CPSU.
In Europe and among dissidents, this has already been dubbed "restalinization".

none





Iron marshal

Iron marshal

After Grechko's death, Dmitry Ustinov, a patriot, innovator and moderate militarist,
was appointed Minister of Defense of the USSR.
He will undoubtedly continue to firmly protect the Brezhnev Doctrine.

none




New marshal

New marshal

After Grechko's death, Semyon Kurkotin was appointed Minister of Defense of the USSR,
who begins to carry out internal reforms in the army:
improves the standard of living and supplies of officers and soldiers; introduces a larger number of
vacations; increases the number of indicators for which
unfit for conscription, thereby reducing the size of the army.

none




Red marshal

Red marshal

After Grechko's death, Sergei Akhromeev was appointed Minister of Defense of the USSR,
who lobbies for an increase in funding for the army and the military-industrial complex, as well as
seeks to catch up and overtake America in a military sense:
increases the production of tanks, weapons, military developments, etc.

none





Helsinki group

Helsinki group

After Comrade Brezhnev signed the Helsinki Charter on Human Rights,
in the USSR, the Helsinki group is created, headed by Yuri Orlov, who personally,
without anyone's permission, decides to declare himself chief inspector of human rights
in the USSR. An illegal group of "inspectors" is gently persecuted, conducting explanatory
conversations with representatives of the KGB, sending letters to workplaces and educational institutions,
however, without any major reprisals, avoiding an international scandal.

none




Helsinki gang

Helsinki gang

The established Helsinki Group, headed by Yuri Orlov, immediately attracted the    attention of
of KGB Chairman Yuri Andropov, who, in order to avoid a repeat of the Hungarian
and Polish scenarios in the USSR, decided, without any meeting.
to round up the illegal inspectors. After they were massively
arrested, the "inspectors" were convicted of anti-Soviet propaganda
and espionage in favor of the United States for terms ranging from 3 to 8 years


none





Death of Biedić

Death of Bijedić

Džemal Bijedić, Chairman of the Federal Executive Council of Yugoslavia,
dies in a plane crash. Rumor has it that he was eliminated,
as an opponent of further reforms and a supporter of the strengthening of Bosnia within the federation.

none




Kremlin hand

Kremlin hand

With the help of the Soviet special services, the assassination attempt on Džemal Bijedić is prevented,
which for a short time stabilizes the situation in Yugoslavia, as well as increases
the political influence of the Soviet Union in it.

none





The end of the president

The end of the president

While Brezhnev was on another long vacation, the Chairman of the KGB
Yuri Andropov started a conspiracy: he persuaded the other members of the Politburo together
to convey to Brezhnev the information that Podgorny wants to remove Leonid Ilyich because of
the deteriorating health of the latter.
"-Leonid, how did it happen?
"The party decided so, not me."

none




As it was

As it was

Andropov does not dare to arrange a conspiracy, out of fear of harming the Soviet Union,
or out of fear of failure, as a result of which everything continues as it was.

none




Soviet power

Soviet power

Andropov's conspiracy failed, with little support from the Politburo, the Politburo majority had to prevent it from happening which forced him to cease his conspiracy . However, information about Andropov's behavior
was leaked to the Chairman of the Presidium of the USSR Supreme Council, which increased Comrade Podgorny's vigilance.
and he began to seek any opportunity to expand
power of the Soviets and the Supreme Council, in order to strengthen both his own power and
security as the head of the Presidium of the Supreme Council.


none





Against the aggressor

Against the aggressor

Somali President Siad Barre visited the Soviet Union to seek support
in the war with Ethiopia. His meetings with Chairman Kosygin of the Council of Ministers, Secretary
and Foreign Minister Gromyko were unsuccessful. The Soviet Union condemned
the aggression of the Somali regime, whereupon the U.S. agreed to assist
Barra in exchange for hosting its own naval base.

none




Not aggression

Not aggression

Upon learning of the secret negotiations between Barre and the Americans, the Soviet leadership
decided to launch a preemptive strike against the Somali warmongers:
The Soviet navy blockaded all Somali ports, destroying their fleet and striking
from ships on Somali positions in order to stop aggression in the region.

none




Beat the aggressor

Beat the aggressor

To stabilize the situation in this region of Africa
the KGB staged a coup against Barre and his Marekhan clan,
by betting on the "Constitutional Caucus" led by Vice President Samantar,
Chairman of the National Security Committee Abdullah and Deputy Prime Minister Farah.
The coup succeeded, Barre was arrested and shot on the spot.
A truce was signed by the new authorities in exchange for autonomy for the Ogaden.
The Marehan clan was defeated, the USSR resumed all supplies and assistance to Somalia.

none





The Fall of Yemen

The Fall of Yemen

President Al-Hamdi of North Yemen, a supporter of the peaceful reunification of
Yemen on the principles of federalism and Arab socialism, was assassinated in a terrorist attack,
by Chief of General Staff Saleh and the Saudi secret service.
Yemen's reunification is canceled and the cold conflict of the two Yemen's begins.

none




New Yemen

New Yemen

The anti-unification conspiracy led by Chief of Staff Saleh
and the Saudi intelligence services was uncovered and dismantled, and President
Al-Hamdi was saved. The failed assassination attempt only spurred the
the leadership of the two Yemenis to accelerate the reunification talks.
The divided nation is once again united!

none





State of the whole people

State of the whole people

In the Soviet Union, a new Constitution was adopted, proclaiming
achievement of Developed socialism and the establishment of the State of the whole people
instead of the dictatorship of the proletariat, which corresponded to the postulates of Lenin
about the absence of classes and dictatorship in socialism, and consolidated
decisions of previous congresses of the CPSU.

none




Still developing

Still developing

Having listened to the criticism of a prominent party member comrade Kosolapov,
the new Constitution of the USSR proclaimed Developing Socialism instead of Developed Socialism,
thereby showing that socialism in the USSR is still at the stage of construction.
At the same time,a thesis was made on the establishment of the state of whole people instead of the dictatorship of the proletariat as a sign of liquidation in the country of
all other classes except the worker and peasant.

none





Victory

Victory

Comrade Brezhnev has many illnesses and is already thinking about his departure.
Many party members worry! And in order to distract dear Leonid Ilyich from such
thoughts, one should caress him, praise and reward him as often as possible, so as not to worry
about the permutations that would have happened under the new ruler.

none




That's enough

That's enough

Moderation should be shown in what to dearly reward Leonid Ilyich, awarding with the Victory Order is already too much and will trample on the memory of the Great Victory.
Those who offered this should be punished with a penalty and an entry on their membership card.

none





Developed

Developed

Following the change in the Constitution of the Soviet Union, a new
The Constitution of the RSFSR, more comprehensive and systematizing, in accordance with
with the complication of social relations in society. However, this
The Constitution increases the terms for the election of the Soviets of People's Deputies and the Supreme Council.

none




Soviet

Soviet

Following the change in the Constitution of the Soviet Union, a new Constitution of the RSFSR was adopted, which was more comprehensive and systematized in accordance with the complication of social relations in society.
However, the new Constitution also included an experimental article on the possibility of recalling deputies of the Soviets of People's Deputies and the Supreme Council by voters, provided there is a sufficient quota of signatures of residents of the district from which the deputy was nominated for recall.
Previously, only a higher body could recall deputies.

none
